page.shortlink: api top records pct list function
page.syntax: Record_List as C = top_records_pct_list(C order ,N percent [,C filter])

argument.name: Record_List
argument.description: A list of the record numbers from the current table.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = "" (record number order). A character order expression that sorts selected records.

argument.name: percent
argument.description: A number from 0 to 100, representing the percentage of the table's records to retrieve. Numeric

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table.

page.discussion: The TOP_RECORDS_PCT_LIST() function returns a list of the record numbers from the current table of the first percent records as defined the Order_Expn and Filter_Expn arguments. This function should be run from an open layout.

section.example: dim frm as P frm = form.view("Customer Information") ? top_records_pct_list("lastname", 25) = "32 56 55 52 54 18 48 8 51 20 30 39 34 10 5 "
